name: Intermission (Ian JCV)
description:
You were just chilling watching cat videos at home when someone took over your TV.  Turns out, it was one of the "Infomercial Cartels" you were hearing a lot about lately, and they're forcing you to buy all of their junk. Can you keep up?

Controls:

Mouse to move the hand, left click to press buttons.

The phone's white button is backspace, the green button is confirm.

Esc to pause.
